input_email_body:
Subject: Customer Support,
I am writing to report a potential security issue with the hospital's system. Recently, there was an unauthorized access attempt, which may be due to insufficient firewall protection My name is Fatima Al-Farsi..
We have taken immediate action to strengthen security protocols and update software to prevent such incidents in the future You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. However, we remain concerned about the potential risks and would like assistance in further investigating the matter.
Could you please look into this and provide us with guidance to ensure the security of the system?
